body: _S. aureus_ strains carrying the plasmid pTet15 \(control) or pTet15-FabF were inoculated from frozen cultures into 25 mls Miller’s LB containing 34 µg/ml chloramphenicol and grown overnight at 37°C with shaking \(220 rpm).
Cultures were diluted in LB to a final OD 600 of

body.body: For each strain, one ml of diluted culture was added to 25 mls  LB/1.2% select agar \(autoclaved and cooled to 50°C) containing 15 µg/ml chloramphenicol and 45 ng/ml anhydrotetracycline, poured into an OmniTray with a 96-well pin lid, and allowed to solidify at room temperature.

body: After solidification, pin lids were removed and 10 µl of various concentrations of platensimycin in DMSO was added to wells on both the control and FabF over expressing plates.
Plates were incubated overnight at 37°C and imaged.
